channel.title: Clinical Policies & Guidelines on Intracav Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Clinical Policies & Guidelines on Intracav Wiki

item.title: Foundations of Clinical Practice and Specialized Population Management
item.description: This comprehensive guide outlines evidence-based principles of vascular access and infusion therapy across the lifespan, including neonatal, pediatric, obstetric, and geriatric populations. It covers regulatory compliance, ethical practice, device selection, infusion accuracy, and population-specific risks such as DEHP exposure, DIVA management, pregnancy-related hypercoagulability, and geriatric polypharmacy. Designed for clinicians, nurses, and vascular access specialists, this resource supports safe, patient-centered decision-making aligned with current standards of care.

item.title: Blood Draws and Hemolysis: Physics, Biochemistry, and Best Practices
item.description: Comprehensive guide to preventing hemolysis during blood draws: understanding catheter-to-vein ratio (CVR), cavitation physics, and evidence-based techniques for optimal lab sample quality.

item.title: Cortisol Levels in Hospital Staff and Work Efficiency: A Critical Clinical Analysis
item.description: Critical analysis of cortisol dysregulation in hospital staff and its impact on clinical performance, patient safety, and healthcare workforce wellbeing with evidence-based interventions.

item.title: ASEPTIC NON-TOUCH TECHNIQUE (ANTT®) in Clinical Practice
item.description: Comprehensive clinical guideline for ASEPTIC NON-TOUCH TECHNIQUE (ANTT®) - evidence-based infection control protocols for invasive procedures and medical device management in healthcare settings.

item.title: Intracav AI Prompting Guidelines
item.description: Complete guide to maximizing Intracav AI effectiveness: best practices for prompting, query formulation, and leveraging AI assistance for vascular access clinical practice and research.

item.title: Exploring the Dynamics of Clinical Decision Making in Vascular Access
item.description: Comprehensive guide to clinical decision-making in vascular access: exploring interprofessional collaboration, evidence-based protocols, and patient-centered care strategies for optimal outcomes.

item.title: Optimizing Vascular Device Removal: Evidence-Based Strategies
item.description: Evidence-based clinical guidelines for vascular access device removal: comprehensive protocols for PIVCs, midline catheters, and central lines to optimize patient safety and outcomes.

item.title: Peripheral Arterial Disease (PAD): Clinical Overview and Vascular Access Considerations
item.description: Comprehensive clinical guideline for Peripheral Arterial Disease (PAD) management in vascular access: evidence-based protocols for assessment, prevention, and treatment strategies.
